```{r setup, include=FALSE}

library(knitr)
library(grid)
library(optparse)
library(png)
```

```{r title, echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
  cat("#", (paste0("Sample: ",params$sample)), "\n")
```

```{r summary_plot, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
 
 img <- readPNG(params$summaryImage)
 grid.raster(img)

```

```{r gamma_plots, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE}

 DIRS<-dir("gammas/")
 DIRS<-as.integer(DIRS)
 BY_INCREASE = order(DIRS)

 gamma = DIRS[BY_INCREASE]
 for (g in gamma) {
  grid.newpage()
  img <- readPNG(paste0("gammas/",g,"/",params$sample,"_gammaPanel_",g,".png"))
  grid.raster(img)
 }

```
